## AABBTree.rayIntersectionTest() method

Checks for intersection between a ray and the AABB tree without calculating the intersection point

**Signature:**

```typescript
rayIntersectionTest(ray: Ray): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ray | [Ray](doc/markdown/./base.ray.md) | The ray being traced |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the ray hits the AABB tree, false otherwise
